Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Between so many bars in Amsterdam I found Cafe Belgique to be with unique character and fabulous atmosphere. So well decorated and lovely it could be only love at the first sight. Staff is just great, friendly and spontaneous. I'll be back next time. It is such a wonderful place to be.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: One of my fav bars in the center of  Amsterdam near Dam square. Great music, decent beer selection, good crowd usually. Really pleasant service :)

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Great cafÃ©.. We enjoyed the service good music and very good beers! It's always nice to visit this bar and easy to reach. Amazing interiors with creative walls, quirky staff and a great atmosphere. Make the most of your visit by piping in early, it fills up quickly and the nightly DJs often bring in the crowds.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: An amazing traditional bar offering more that 50 varieties of Belgium beers. Stunning interiors with creative walls, quirky staff and a great atmosphere. Make the most of your visit by piping in early, it fills up quickly and the nightly DJs often bring in the crowds, there is limited outdoor seating also.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Very small pub but worth the visit!

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Little, cozy, great offer on Belgium beers, sometimes with a DJ playing some records inside, this bar is a prime jewel in Amsterdam city center. I love to  catch a beer here and listen to some tunes. Always good after work or as a night starter.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text:
Just super!

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: We came here quite frequently as we love Belgian beers and there's a large selection. It's a great place to stop for a break from shopping as it's in that location. The staff are friendly and it's a relaxed place to sit but we only visited during the day.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Enjoyable small pub, felt like a nice escape from all of the tourist pubs. Felt like I got a real flavour of the pubs/bars of Holland.  Sold a great selection of Belgian ales. A personal favourite was Kwak.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Tiny space, amazing beer selection! Belgian beer is a must and if you're visiting Amsterdam, come to this cozy, warm bar. This was my friends and my favorite spot for excellent beer in Amsterdam.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Small but great beer is served here. The DJ gets you into a nice vibe while you try to get a glimpse of the walls' decor. Tip: I saw many try going upstairs to find a seat; don't bother... there's only a bathroom up there.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Small place, good for a quick beer. Can get really crowded though!

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Cozy and small, awesome Belgian beers and great service.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Great little cafe. The beer is delicious and not too expensive. It can feel a little crammed as it is a small place. The staff were nice and friendly. The overall vibe in there was chic and relaxing. I will be back.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Really enjoyed this spot was suprisingly quiet for being a side street off damrak (one of main street of Amsterdam toward dam sqaure) and not too expensive for a good pint, staff were great and helpful, appeared to be plenty of good â€¦

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Met  with  a  couple  of  old   Acquaintances  in  this  hidden  gem  recently.  Located  on  Gravenstraat   just  off  the  beaten  path. Great  selection  of  premium  Belgian  beers. Very  cosy  and  intimate  atmosphere.  Also, very  friendly  staff  and  clientele.  Gezellig!

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Really nice place. Small but cozy. A large variety of beers to choose from.When I will go back to Amsterdam, I will definitely will go back there

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Small dark bar in an alley near the Nieuwe Kerk.   Outstanding beer selection.  Very high turnover on the beer so it's always fresh.  Definitely worth a visit just to see where it is and also taste the Kwak beer.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: the best "hidden" places of the city. only 2 tables inside, 2 benches outside. but a wide range of belgian biers on tap, nice crowd, and Maaike is the best bartender :)

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: A bit strange place. Local and tourists mixing. Can find really good classic Dutch and Belgian beers - not much of the "new craft". A tiny space that probably could be very cozy - but we must have been unlucky and drop during a spell of rather peculiar and uninviting atmosphere.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Horrible cheap dive for punks and addicts. I would have never set my foot there if that were not for a local guide who wanted me to see it. I guess he wanted to impress me in his special kind of way. It is literally vomitrocious.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: This bar is one of Amsterdam's best kept secrets. Just down a tiny alleyway from the walking street, you'll find this whole-in-the-wall place. The beer selection is awesome and there is a ton of energy coming out of such a small bar.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Cosy small bar, with 8 draught beer choices and the other alcoholic suspect's hanging from the bar, relaxed mood and a flowing dj that rides on good vibes mixes via jazz dips, old school vintages&gems. Due to it's -out of sight- location â€¦

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Small bar and friendly staff.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: We loved this bar. Was recommended by a friend and we went back twice in the two days we were in Amsterdam. Great range of draught beers at reasonable prices (my favourite was Kwak). Friendly staff and nice atmosphere.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Like many bars in Amsterdam, this place is both tiny and expensive. There's a good range of Belgian beer to choose from. Very limited seating.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Have been here a fair few times and each time has been better than the last. The Belgium beer menu is something to behold, stunning Kwak on draught  and fantastic knowledgeable staff. Highly recommend

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: Very nice place and very good beers.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
Review Text: The bar is small but has a lot of charm to it. With a nice diversity in beer it can offer a great start or ending to your night out in Amsterdam.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Belgique
